name: alienness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of seeming very strange and not at all familiar: A sense of mystery pervades the film, particularly the looming alienness of the mountain. I had no idea what "albedo" meant and was struck by the sheer alienness of the word.
the quality of belonging to or coming from a place, country, group of people, or planet that is not your own and is not familiar: Unlike many European colonials, he was not at all disturbed by the alienness of Africa. Related words
alien
alienly
More examplesFewer examplesThe film's score emphasizes the alienness of the setting.She found that a feeling of alienness, of not being at home, was helpful to her creativity.He grew up in the mid-West and was enraptured by Tokyo's alienness.
